name: Jumpman Forever
description:
The successfully Kickstarter-funded Jumpman Forever is the modern sequel to the 1983 classic video game Jumpman for the Atari 400 / 800 & Commodore 64 computers. Every effort has been made to keep the original gameplay style, clunky 80’s style graphics, and amazing level design! Jumpman Forever features:

  • 32 Levels brand-new old-school inspired levels
  • 4 Game Modes
  • 2 Playable Characters
  • Mind-bending action puzzles
  • And more ways to die than you can shake a stick at

But we’re not stopping there. Every quarter, we’re releasing another free Jumpman Forever level pack for the next two years! We don’t want to just create a great game and walk away – we want to create a game that keeps people playing (and hopefully keeps new people buying it!) On top of that, we’ll be releasing the Jumpman Forever Level Editor and sharing community, letting everyone get in on the fun of creating and playing even more awesome levels!
